description: Working with the community has a been a blessing for me. Getting to know new people and families and finding them their new home is exciting. I have been a successful realtor since 2002. 2003 Realtor Rookie of the Year 2014 Coldwell Banker International Sterling Society

You can trust me to do the best job possible for you as your agent to achieve the desired results in the purchase /sale of your home. I am a results-oriented professional with over 30 years of experience in sales and marketing and over 11 years of experience in the real estate market in the Lompoc Valley. I have lived in Lompoc for over 22 years and am very familiar with the real estate climate in the area. As a member of the Coldwell Banker Select team in Lompoc, I have demonstrated success in identifying customer needs and providing exceptional service to my clients with the highest degree of integrity and professionalism. More

Coldwell Banker has a heritage of over 100 years dedicated to honesty, ethics and integrity. These are the cornerstones of the brand, and I support them completely. Our local office of experienced sales professionals carries on that Coldwell Banker tradition and participates in 25% of all transactions in our local community. That combined with my dedication to my clients, local market knowledge, negotiating skills, being detail oriented, and 20 years experience in the financial planning sector, will benefit you as I share my expertise representing you as your agent in the purchase or sale of your home. I fell that I am the right person to work for you and I would like to apply for that job.

I moved to Lompoc in 1992 with the intent to raise a family and own property. In the 28 years that I have lived here I've come to realize that Lompoc really is the Central Coast best kept secret. From the small town atmosphere to the reasonable cost of living, we are just a short drive from any event on the Central Coast. I would love to help you with your real estate needs. Contact me today... I moved to Lompoc in 1992 with the intent to raise a family and own property. In the 28 years that I have lived here I've come to realize that Lompoc really is the Central Coast best kept secret. From the small town atmosphere to the reasonable cost of living, we are just a short drive from any event on the Central Coast. I would love to help you with your real estate needs. Contact me today and lets get started. More

Hello and welcome to Lompoc, the Valley of Arts and Flowers . You may, or may not, be familiar with our town. That's okay. My family has been enjoying this area since 1991. We have watched Lompoc grow and Lompoc has helped us grow too! I am ready to help you with your real estate needs and can share with you all the reasons we LOVE our city. Whether you are looking for the perfect home or wanting to sell a property, we will team up to accomplish your goals. I am experienced in Residential and Agricultural properties; short sales, foreclosures, auctions, rehabs, reverse mortgages and more.

WHETHER YOU WANT TO SELL OR BUY A HOME, AS A REALTOR, I WILL PROVIDE ONLY SUPERIOR SERVICE TOWARD FULFILLING YOUR REAL ESTATE NEEDS IS MY GOAL. YOUR SATISFACTION & TO MAKE REAL ESTATE EASY IS MY GOAL.

Promoting Collaborative Economic Growth in our Community. My name is Kingsley Kwaku Attor, a resident of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania since 2005; having moved from Maplewood, New Jersey where I had live since 1995. I am married with two kids in this serene and beautiful town. At a young age, I learned the importance of exceeding customer expectations in a fast paced family business which set the stage for profitable repeat business and that's where I also cultivated my passion for successful entrepreneurship. As your realtor, your homeownership dreams would be matched by my dedication & commitment to hard work & customer delight through all phases of the process. As my client, you come first, hence, you can rest assured knowing that your real estate experience will be smooth and enjoyable with a professional REALTOR working on your behalf. Whether you are looking to downsize, upsize, or purchase your first home: my hard work, attention to detail, excellent customer service & negotiation skills will ensure that your dreams come true.  Always on the lookout to grant a helping hand, my neighbors have come to expect nothing less than a warm smile and a friendly demeanor from me to those I meet as I endeavor to make especially new residents feel welcome in our community. I strive to be someone you would proudly refer to your family and friends, as such, your satisfaction is my priority! I look forward to collaborating with you to make your real estate dream a reality as we enhance the economic growth of our community one house at a time!

Born and raised in New Jersey and settled in Pennsylvania, my overall life experience can help you find the exact location best suited for many years to come. As a Coldwell Banker Hearthside Agent, I am committed to building a relationship of trust based on honesty and mindfulness toward every aspect of your situation. My primary focus is of due diligence and a personalized experience for you my client, while encouraging fun and laughter along the way! You¿re wants and needs are of vital importance to my goal of finding you the perfect real estate solutions. Utilizing the many tailored tools of the Cliff Lewis Experience will aide me in helping you through the real estate process and ensuring that you enjoy an excellent transactional experience from start to finish. Though it all I¿ll be there to keep you smiling!

Hello, it's an absolute pleasure to meet you! My name is Sarne Brewster. I was raised in an entrepreneurial-spirited family & am a self starter. I come from a background of management & customer service, with 7 years of that being in property management. This has included property acquisition, maintenance, repairs, & furnishing units I've managed. I believe that my single greatest purpose is to be your voice, partner, confidant, & resource throughout the entire process of buying or selling your home. While we are working together, I will strive to take some of the stress out of one of the largest transactions of your lifetime. While we certainly hope for a bump-free transaction, I have the skill set & resources to make sure they are flattened out quickly. I am proud to say that I work with The Frank Renaldi Team at Century 21 Pinnacle. With over 40 years of real estate experience & an amazing support system, we are able to assist you with any aspect of your real estate portfolio! We are here for YOU. I can promise that I will always be honest & fair with you. What that means to me is setting realistic expectations that I can deliver on, even if it isn't always easy to hear. We are here to make your dreams a reality & hope we have the opportunity to work together!

I have been involved in real estate since 2008 when I purchased my first investment property. I then began to buy more properties and eventually decided I should become a real estate agent.  Having come from a customer service background, it made sense to dive into real estate head first. Helping people is what being a real estate agent is all about and I find joy in being able to help people navigate through the process of buying, selling, or investing in real estate. Whether you are buying, selling, investing, residential or commercial, I am here to help you!

Licensed in 2006, I represent over 15 years as a Seller and Buyer Agent.  My experience combined with my background in Communications and Sociology have prepared me to anticipate and serve my client's real estate needs with honesty & Integrity. As a Lehigh Valley resident since 2000, I have chosen to raise my family here.  My daughters are very active which has given me the opportunity to make connections throughout our local communities.

I am a dedicated, passionate and market-savvy professional who puts his clients' satisfaction before all else. Joseph has been a licensed realtor since 2008. Designations include Realtor å¨, CNRS, CNAS Hobbies and interests include:music, fishing, hiking, hunting, baseball/softball, football/rugby, golf, hockey, skiing, wrestling, aerobics, biking, running, swimming, weight lifting, cooking/baking, movies, pet lover, renovations, travelMemberships and/or Organizations include:NAR, PAR, LVAR, Lehigh Valley Music AssociationRecognition and Awards:2016 Coldwell Banker International Sterling Society, 2016 Coldwell Banker Hearthside Diamond ClubA message from Joseph:Joseph Cenchitz is a dedicated, passionate and market-savvy professional who puts his clients' satisfaction before all else. His attention to detail, superior people skills, broad knowledge of the real estate industry as a whole and pure determination to indulge his clients with first-class service set him apart. Joseph understands the power of creative, well-organized and highly effective marketing and offers customized marketing plans that maximize property exposure to the most qualified buyers. A real estate transaction is really about managing people, their desires and their finances. Joseph knows that it is not only important to secure the most able buyer, but also the one who is most likely to close the deal. When so much is at stake, Joseph is the one clients want to represent them. His fair yet aggressive negotiating style and protectiveness of his clients' best interests and ultimately, their assets, has gained him respect with colleagues and clients alike. Joseph knows that every transaction represents the most important purchase or sale a person can make, and he takes every precaution to ensure that communication is impeccable with all parties involved from beginning to end. Whether he is patiently guiding first-time buyers through this exciting process or following through with clients' needs long after the transaction is over, his warm, caring yet efficient business style often turns clients into clients for life.

I am a Penn State student pursuing a civil engineering degree with a minor in residential construction. Real estate is a large aspect of what I am learning and created a new passion for me to pursue. Being a native of Lehigh Valley, I chose to join Chris's team to get started with my real estate career and help people with the buying and selling process. The main aspects of my education taught me to serve the community, which drives me to operate in the best interest of the people I am working for and with.

Rennard is a licensed Realtor in Pennsylvania. He is part of the Eric Rothenberger Team.  When working with Rennard you will quickly learn that he puts your needs and wants first. Listening is the key to his success. His goal is to get you what you want.  Rennard prides himself in listing homes and getting the highest possible price in the shortest amount of time. Selling For Sale By Owner properties is something he is passionate about. He develops an individual marketing plan for each property. Pulling from his background as a Home Inspection, Internal Auditor, and Insurance Underwriter are the keys to his Real Estate success.  Rennard is also a graduate of Tennessee State University with a degree in Business Administration. Let Rennard take the stress out of selling your home.

I am a real estate agent, business owner, boy, and dog mom from Nazareth, PA. My career has been shaped by a unique path from working as the Director of Community Life in a retirement community, to editing and formatting patents for the US Patent Office, to now selling real-estate and owning my own transaction management business. But the hardest and most rewarding job I have had is being a mom of two boys! My husband, Dustin, and I always put our family first. That's why we understand that the decision to move and purchase or sell a home is one of the biggest decisions you can make for your family. As the client, YOU and YOUR family are what matters most to us. The home you are buying has to work for your family dynamic to be the right home and we love helping our clients navigate the home-buying process with their family's needs in mind. Working together as a team allows us to offer our clients an organized and stress-free home buying experience and we pride ourselves on family values and satisfied customers.

Born and raised in the Lehigh Valley, I have the ideal foundation for a successful career as a real estate agent in this community through local knowledge and past work experience. I have built my reputation on honesty, knowledge, and loyalty. I've brought my entrepreneurial passion and expertise in marketing, real estate photography, and graphic design to the real estate world in 2018. I am continually building a reputation for exceptional service helping buyers and sellers in Northampton and Lehigh county. My philosophy has always been client first. This thinking continually requires me to improve my skill set and my ways of doing business - which in turn elevates my clients¿ overall experience in the buying and selling process. At the end of the day, my priorities are simple. They are YOUR priorities. I always strive to see my transactions close quickly and on time, and to keep you informed and confident in the process every step of the way. I will always be honest with you, and I do not make promises that I cannot deliver on, however, I do promise to work FOR you and WITH you to reach YOUR goals. When I¿m not working, I love to spend time with my wife and two crazy boys at our home in Nazareth. I also enjoy playing guitar, singing, cooking, and photography.

"All Things Home" has always been a passion of mine. I've always appreciated everything that goes into making a house a home. From the buying and selling process, to the remodeling, to the cleaning and organizing - I love it all! So it just makes sense that the first home my husband and I bought over 20 years ago turned into our first rehab and flip. Even though my career path went in different directions, real estate was always a constant force as we renovated and flipped more and more homes throughout the years. Over time, it only made sense that I obtained my real estate license and share my experience with clients looking to buy or sell. With six years of real estate sales already under my belt, I joined Coldwell Banker Hearthside in January of 2021. My passion for "All Things Home" means that my clients get over 20 years experience of home knowledge and superior customer service in their home journey. As a member of the Cliff Lewis Experience, you get not just me but an entire team of professionals by your side every step of the way. As a lifelong resident of the Lehigh Valley I am passionate about our neighborhoods, small businesses, and everything our area has to offer. I live in Bethlehem with my husband Chad, two children Cameron & Ava, and our larger than life dog, Rocco. While I am constantly in the midst of a renovation or house flip project I make my real estate clients my TOP priority. I look forward to helping you make your next house a home!

Jessica spends her days working for Coldwell Banker Hearthside with the Cliff Lewis Experience Team she serves the Lehigh Valley and surrounding areas, where she goes above and beyond to provide her clients with a responsive, stress-free, VIP-style experience. With a daily routine including everything from ¿prospecting,¿ administrative work and mentoring, to meetings, showings, listing appointments and touring communities, she¿s breaking the mold and proving to her clients that being a realtor means so much more than simply ¿getting the sale.¿  Customers feel confident that when they choose to work with Jessica, they are going to be advised from the beginning to the end.   It¿s important to epitomize integrity, energy, hard work and creative service in every detail of a customer¿s real estate transaction.

As a Pennsylvania native, I care deeply about the community. And everyone who lives in it. I am your neighbor. I treat all my clients with respect and loyalty. I am dedicated to finding you the best deal for every client. I will work hard to find the right property for you. And through on-going communications I will guide you through your real estate needs. I am trustworthy and will protect you and your financial interests. You can be confident that any information you provide to me will be protected. At Coldwell Banker Hearthside ¿ The Cliff Lewis Experience, I have access to a world-renowned team and tools to help you on your way to your real estate dreams. I understand that the process of purchasing a property can be overwhelming. I am here to guide you through the process so that you are happy with the end result for years to come.

Purchasing a home.... or selling one?  Then you'll need GUIDANCE. Finding the Perfect house, or Finding Someone to love your house (if you're a seller), is only the tip of the iceberg.  That's where the Guidance part comes in....it's time to speak with Heather Fehr.  She is a knowledgeable, full time Realtor of 15 Years, and has over 25+ years experience in the Customer Service field.  That's what being a Realtor is mostly all about.....Extreme Customer Service!!!  She knows that there's a lot more to purchasing real estate, than just finding the right House.  If you've ever heard the phrase "It's the largest transaction of a lifetime", you already know part of it.  The other important part is making sure you have the best agent representing YOU in order to successfully purchase or sell your next Home!   Heather consistently shows Professionalism, Integrity and Enthusiasm as she goes above and beyond for her clients.  From the initial home search, to negotiations, home inspections, appraisals, contract/ paperwork compliancy and referrals of home contractors and other professionals!  You will be in a better financial position, when you put her strong negotiating skills to work for you!  Continuing Education in this ever changing Market, keeps her knowledgeable and on target to best represent you.

Practicing Real Estate since 1988 Coldwell Banker Hearthside Relocation Team Specialist New Construction Specialist Certified CMP Certified CSP Serving the Lehigh Valley and Northampton County Practicing Real Estate since 1988 Coldwell Banker Hearthside Relocation Team Specialist New Construction Specialist Certified CMP Certified CSP Serving the Lehigh Valley and Northampton County

My name is Valerie Geiger. I was born and raised in the Lehigh Valley. I have an intimate knowledge of the area and a strong desire to make my home your home.  Whether you¿re looking to buy, sell, invest or anything real estate-related I¿m there to guide you through the process.  Outside of being an agent, I have been an entrepreneur for over 30 plus years. My life and passion have always fueled me by serving people. I'm still currently a salon and suites owner servicing clients and providing them with loyalty, honesty, and drive which makes it easy to provide the same treatment to my real estate clients.  When I¿m not serving clients I¿m spending quality time with my family. I¿m a single parent to two amazing boys. We instill in each other to always strive to do better and be better in all aspects of our lives. With that being said, being part of the Eric Rothenberger Group of Coldwell Banker Hearthside has provided me with the knowledge, support, and professionalism to grow my business and achieve personal goals. With this solid foundation, I hope to be a valuable real estate resource to you, your family, and friends.

Growing up I moved around a lot and I know how stressful it can be to find a home that meets all your needs, so one of the reasons I'm excited about working in real estate is so that I can make that process easier for you. While I may have lived in many different places, I consider the Lehigh Valley home and am extremely familiar with the surrounding areas. I can't wait to help you find your own home here in the valley. I pride myself on the philosophy of never giving up and being consistent with everything you do to get the outcome you deserve and want. I have 10 years of experience in customer service and I am fully committed to continuing that exceptional customer service for my clients. I have a deep sense of idealism and integrity, but I am not an idle dreamer; I take concrete steps to realize my goals and make a lasting impact. I want to find purpose and meaning in the work I do, knowing that I am helping and connecting with others.

Arial;color:#074A86">Cecil Hamilton is a native of Sierra Leone, West Africa. After graduating from the University of Sierra Leone with a bachelor¿s degree in civil engineering in 1986, he relocated to the USA in 1991 in pursuit of his American dream. Over the past twenty-seven years, Cecil has subsequently held a Vice President position in various financial institutions including JPMorgan, Credit Suisse, and Barclays Bank. Arial;color:#074A86">After spending the early nineties living in New York, Cecil moved to New Jersey where he lived for 26 years before moving to Pennsylvania in 2019. He has lived in some very diverse communities and understands, not only why people relocate, but also why they move to the places that they do.  Although Cecil never pursued his desire to work in Civil Engineering, he found a new passion in the real estate industry, buying, renting, and selling houses over the past twenty years. Cecil became fascinated with touring properties, learning their history of them, imagining what it would take to increase their value, and helping families find their own homes. This passion and entrepreneurial spirit, together with his certifications in Business Analysis and Project Management, has propelled him further into the world of real estate and becoming a real estate agent. Arial;color:#074A86">  Cecil is very family-oriented. He and his wife, a Barbadian native and 21-year veteran educator, enjoy a blended family of 7 Kids and 10 grandkids with whom they make it a priority to spend quality time. When not helping Lehigh Valley home buyers/sellers, Cecil enjoys traveling, listening to music, fine dining, volunteering, watching sports, and playing pool.

Alexandra Herman strives to demonstrate the highest level of integrity and commitment, and to bring a little fun into every real estate transaction! I work hard for my clients, making sure they all get the best deals possible. My enthusiasm for helping others is what inspired my passion for real estate. My business is built on: Dedication, Determination, Communication & Trust: while embodying the ability to cater and adapt to all my clients Real Estate needs.

Amy Huynh is a long time resident of the Wilkes Barre/Scranton area and has relocated to the  Lehigh Valley. Amy's successful experience in hospitality has given her the skills and ability to form important relationships needed to make deals happen. Amy has a keen sense of the housing market and regional demographics.  Amy's primary focus is the residential market given her quick ability to pair clients with their specific desires. With a passion for service, Amy is ready to help with your home buying and selling needs. As a proud member of the Coldwell Banker Hearthside Cliff Lewis family, Amy carries the values of hard work, integrity, and outstanding client service into everything she does.

Selling ? Buying ? In either direction you are heading let me join you in your journey . My name is Diana Irizarry and i can help guide you in the right path. Being a real estate agent is my passion and i am very skilled at it . You have made the decision to move forward ( selling or buying ) , now let me do what i do best and help you find your new home. With over 10 years of customer service... Selling ? Buying ? In either direction you are heading let me join you in your journey . My name is Diana Irizarry and i can help guide you in the right path. Being a real estate agent is my passion and i am very skilled at it . You have made the decision to move forward ( selling or buying ) , now let me do what i do best and help you find your new home. With over 10 years of customer service and one on one personal attention to detail i am very confident we can find ( or sell ) your dream home. Need to upgrade , or downsize, retire or start a new life ? I will not only work tirelessly for you , I promise to navigate through the home search , negotiations , inspections and appraisals with professionalism . So let me accompany you in making your next house into a lovely HOME SWEET HOME ! stress free . More

To navigate the complex decisions involved in today's real estate market requires the guidance of a professional. I am committed to service with an emphasis on accountability, reliability, timeliness and enthusiasm. I provide my clients with all the information necessary to help make real estate investment decisions throughout the changing market cycles. A successful real estate transaction is built upon the strength of relationships and the experience of how to get things done. I am well respected by my peers and past clients, and have developed invaluable working relationships with other professionals in my industry such as title companies, attorneys, lenders and appraisers.

mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri;color:#2A2A33">As a lifelong resident of the Lehigh Valley, Chris Lawlor has a unique knowledge of the local real estate market. This knowledge, paired with his drive to exceed clients¿ expectations, has allowed Chris to help nearly 500 families buy or sell a home.  Over the past few years, Chris has adopted the team approach to real estate sales. Surrounded by other top agents, his team has been able to grow exponentially in a short period of time. Each individual member contributes a different strength to the team which translates to an easier process for their clients. Chris and the team believe strongly that continued growth is the key to a fulfilled life. The team is focused on helping more people achieve their real estate goals, continuing to learn, and pushing to be the best.

Hi, I'm Colleen, I am a new agent on The Chris Lawlor Team. I was born and raised in the Lehigh Valley and I am looking to establish a career in real estate in the place that defines home for me. I want to help buyers find their perfect home and make the hard decisions a little bit easier and seamless. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions you have about real estate!

Jerry is a 33-year resident of the Lehigh Valley and has held various executive sales positions during that time and now decided to work alongside his son as a member of the Chris Lawlor Team. Jerry has utilized his business acumen and helped his clients during the stressful moments of selling or buying a home. This expertise combined with the support from a great team environment ensures you a winning solution to your real estate needs.
Lehigh Valley 2011 Top Producer Coldwell Banker Hearthside Coldwell Banker International Diamond Club award Coldwell Banker International Sterling Society award

My goal is always to help clients realize their dreams. Whether it be buying, selling, or investing in a property. I assist new clients to catch their dreams of buying and selling a wonderful home or buying an investment property. A resident of Pennsylvania for more than 30 years, I have lived and worked in many areas in the Lehigh Valley. My business is based on more than 80 percent referrals from satisfied clients. Most importantly in providing the most excellent service to buyers, sellers, and investors I have earned their trust, referrals, and repeat business. I have assisted my client with homes and properties in all price ranges from starter homes and high-dollar estate properties to uptown condominiums, ranch properties, and investment properties. Clients appreciate my flexibility, low-pressure sales, patience, ability to listen and hear what a client wants, negotiation and analytic skills, and ability to accurately price and market a home.

I am a wife, mother and advocate for family and kindness. am also a licensed realtor with Coldwell Banker Hearthside. My previous career was in publishing, sales and marketing. I am a wife, mother and advocate for family and kindness. am also a licensed realtor with Coldwell Banker Hearthside. My previous career was in publishing, sales and marketing. I¿ve worked in New York City, London, and Edinburgh before settling down here in the Lehigh Valley with my husband George, my son James and our pup Maddie.I was the Consumer Sales and Marketing Director at The Morning Call for 12 years. Prior to that I worked for publications covering horse racing, scuba diving, international politics and Scottish news and information.Although I enjoyed my previous career, I love what I do now. For me, working in real estate is about being present and committed to my buyers and sellers, helping them with every step in the sales process, most importantly with negotiating, and using my marketing background to bring buyers and sellers together.So whatever life event brings you to the decision that it¿s time to buy or sell your home, I¿m here to help you live the life of your dreams. As an area native, I have a wealth of knowledge and love for Lehigh Valley's cities and the surrounding areas. Working with Coldwell Banker Hearthside and the Eric Rothenberger Group gives me the advantage of working alongside other industry experts to your benefit. With over 20 years of customer service expertise, listening to and meeting my client's needs is my top priority. As a full-time agent, I am dedicated to being available to you, explaining and guiding you through each step of the process, and celebrating together at closing.  I would love to help make your dream of buying, selling, or investing in real estate a reality. Please give me a call today for more information.

Buying or selling a house can be difficult and very stressful but as a real estate agent, I'm here to assist my clients every step of the way. I will work hard every day in order to provide my clients with the best service possible. Listening to my clients is very important to accommodate their wants and needs when buying or selling a home. I believe I can transform this process from taxing to fun and exciting.

Buying or selling a home can be one of the most stressful life experiences. I know because a difficult home purchase was one of my motivations for becoming a real estate agent. I'm here to provide you with the guidance you need to feel security, confidence and absolute certainty. If you¿re thinking about buying or selling a home in the Northampton County and surroundings , it would be my honor and pleasure to help! Please contact me. I can¿t wait to hear from you!

An accomplished Realtor and a Lehigh Valley Resident for over 40 years and with a proven track record since 2007, Eric is a true leader in the real estate industry. With 14 consecutive years as a Producer in the multi-million dollar sales range in all styles of homes sales, he has consistently displayed his service-oriented attitude with Integrity in every transaction. His experience as a Realtor and extensive background in Customer Service makes Eric a trustworthy source of information for both buyers and sellers. Eric also provides a FREE moving truck for all his clients to use along with moving boxes. TRULY "Service that moves you" Always striving to provide his clients with excellence in service, marketing, communication, and superior customer service. Everything is done above and beyond expectations! Innovative Marketing Techniques, Superior Communication, Motivated Support Team to Ensure Seamless Transactions, High Standard of Excellence and Ethics, Devoted to Implementing "What's Next" in Technology, Trustworthy, Maintaining Highest Levels of Integrity, Competent and Knowledgeable, and Commitment to Results sums up The Eric Rothenberger Group!

It's not every day that you buy or sell your home- let me be the one to help guide you through this process. You can count on me to be diligent, dependable and honest - my job is not complete until you are satisfied and happy!

My name is Larissa Savitsky. I am a certified Realtor in the Susquehanna Valley. I¿ve worked in the local area for the past 15 years from waitressing to Case Management. I¿ve always enjoyed listening to the needs of my clients¿ and assisting them to their goal.  Whether you are looking to buy your first home, looking to upsize or downsize for your family, or listing your home for someone else to buy, I would love to assist you. I was born and raised in Northumberland, PA which is near to the beautiful Susquehanna River. I graduated from Shikellamy High School and then 4 years later from Bloomsburg University. When I am not helping clients I can be found spending time in my backyard with my daughter and 4 dogs. My love for Real estate began when my boyfriend and I purchased our first home in summer 2020. As a lifetime resident of the Lehigh Valley has given me extensive knowledge of the area. I enjoy sharing my passion and experience of this wonderful area with others. With a background in customer service, I am dedicated to helping others achieve their goals through my work.

Real estate is my passion. I have been in the real estate industry for 15+ years and have sold over 500 properties. Helping people achieve their goals is what drives me day in and day out. Whether you are a seasoned real estate investor or buying your first home, I will be there for you every step of the way. Being licensed in Pennsylvania and New Jersey has also allowed me to expand my area of coverage. I truly enjoy what I do and I continue to improve my skills on a daily basis.

Treating Clients Like Family. I believe that your home is your sanctuary, and should be treated as such. Whether you're buying your first home, moving up to a larger family home or seeking that dream retirement residence, the experience should be nothing less than seamless. As a homeowner myself, I understand that your home is more than just a place to live - it's where you make long-lasting memories. I help my clients navigate the often challenging waters of the home buying and selling process, with the end result only being a wonderful experience. As a full-time Coldwell Banker Hearthside® agent, I'm sincerely passionate about the real estate business & industry.  Whether it's my relentless dedication to help my clients find the home of their dreams, my innovative strategies to ensure they get the most for their home, or if you're simply just curious about the local market; I'm always happy to chat!  I have my finger on the pulse of the local market and will confidently navigate you through the complex intricacies of the home buying or selling process.  With access to every home for sale, a powerful & globally recognized brand, cutting-edge technology, and razor-sharp marketing strategies,  I will work tirelessly to make sure you have the most enjoyable and unforgettable real estate experience that continues long after the closing date!
